callableTimes.description: The list of CallableTimes for which it is acceptable to place outbound calls.

timeSlots.description: The time intervals for which it is acceptable to place outbound calls.

day.description: The day of the interval. Valid values: [1-7], representing Monday through Sunday

startTime.description: The start time of the interval as an ISO-8601 string, i.e. HH:mm:ss

stopTime.description: The end time of the interval as an ISO-8601 string, i.e. HH:mm:ss

timeZoneId.description: The time zone for the time slots; for example, Africa/Abidjan

dateCreated.description: Creation time of the entity. Date time is represented as an ISO-8601 string. For example: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss[.mmm]Z

dateModified.description: Last modified time of the entity. Date time is represented as an ISO-8601 string. For example: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss[.mmm]Z

id.description: The globally unique identifier for the object.

version.description: Required for updates, must match the version number of the most recent update
